### Map Created with Leaflet
#### Date: July 13, 2017

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
df <- data.frame(
    lat = c(39.2973166, 39.2906617, 39.3288851, 39.2970681, 39.2824806),
    lng = c(-76.5929798, -76.62065928, -76.5469683, -76.6150537, -76.6016766))
df%>%
    leaflet()%>%
    addTiles()%>%
    addMarkers()

```
